programs.title: Agility Lower Body Program 1.1
programs.requirements: Dumbbells, Exercise Band, Swiss Ball, Trap Bar

exercises.name: Warm Up 1: Decline Pistols
exercises.note: Two seconds down, one second up. Elevate your heel.

exercises.name: Warm Up 3: TKEs
exercises.note: Keep the sole of your foot from rolling inward.

exercises.name: Exercise 1: DB Squat Jumps
exercises.note: Weight: 10 lbs

exercises.name: Exercise 2: Trap Bar Deadlift
exercises.note: Rate of Perceived Exertion: 8/10

exercises.name: Exercise 3: Swiss Ball Leg Curls
exercises.note: Focus on keeping your balance.

exercises.name: Exercise 4: Side Planks
exercises.note: Kneeling.

exercises.name: Exercise 5: Hindu Squats
exercises.note: No resting.

exercises.name: Warm Up 1: Decline Pistols
exercises.note: Two seconds down, one second up. Elevate your heel.

exercises.name: Warm Up 2: Heel Taps
exercises.note: Weight: 10 lbs

exercises.name: Warm Up 3: TKEs
exercises.note: Keep the sole of your foot from rolling inward.

exercises.name: Exercise 1: DB Squat Jumps
exercises.note: Weight: 10 lbs

exercises.name: Exercise 2: Trap Bar Deadlift
exercises.note: Work up to your 3 to 5 rep max.

exercises.name: Exercise 3: Split Squats & Iso-Holds
exercises.note: Controlled on the way down. This is a super set.

exercises.name: Exercise 4: GHR
exercises.note: Substitute any hamstring workout if needed.

exercises.name: Exercise 5: Rolling Side Planks
exercises.note: Rolling to each side is one rep.
